nodes.text: Graag was a Hutt leader of the Hutt Cartel during the Cold War. During the Quesh crisis in 3642 BBY, the Hutt Cartel had sent Graag to Quesh to oversee the destruction of the Three Families and the Cartel's neutrality in the war. However, Graag and his Cartel droids were unable to make progress against the Three Families, due to their factories being defended by Jedi.
